text: Bente is a former civil parish in the municipality of Vila Nova de Famalicão in the Minho region, Portugal. In 2013, the parish merged into the new parish Carreira e Bente. Its surface area is 1.30 km² and its population, in 2001, was 959. ==References== Category:Parishes of Vila Nova de Famalicão Category:Former parishes of Portugal
title: Bente, Portugal
